# Parallel Computing {#parallel}


## Bibliographic Notes
For an up-to-date list of packages suppoerting parallel programming see the High Performance Computing [R task view](https://cran.r-project.org/web/views/HighPerformanceComputing.html).

For a full review see @chapple2016mastering.
